issue.title: [CF 76] Addon error when logging in Shaman
issue.body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Create a shaman.
Create a TMW bar with a icon for totem, with these options:
  Name: Searing Totem
  Enable Icon - True
  Type - Totem/non-MOG ghoul
  Show timer - True
  Show timer number - True
  Show icon when - Present
Log off.
Log in.  ->  Error pops up.

What is the expected output?
No error.

What do you see instead?
Error.

What version of the product are you using?
TMW latest from WoWInterface (has been giving the error for past 3-4 versions).

Do you have an error log of what happened?
Date: 2010-12-30 18:52:44
ID: 1
Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: ..\AddOns\TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua line 1864:
   GetSpellTexture(): Invalid spell slot
Debug:
   [C]: ?
   [C]: ?
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1864: TellMeWhen_Icon_Totem_OnUpdate()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:1151: TellMeWhen_Icon_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:833: TellMeWhen_Group_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:620: TellMeWhen_Update()
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:642:
      TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:639


> Posted by CurseForge user junbin | Imported from CurseForge issue #76 | Raw

comments.body:
"TMW latest from WoWInterface (has been giving the error for past 3-4 versions)." is not a version number.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
